channel.title: How can I make it so you can buy items with kills, not GP?
channel.description:
I want one shop to buy items with kills, and the rest of the shops will require gold.
Any help would be massively appreciated, I'm currently doing my own research as I wait for a response.

item.title: How can I make it so you can buy items with kills, not GP?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Shops currency

Look in the buyItem code for where it takes and deletes your coins and simply make an exception in it for whatever shop id you want to take the pk points and make it subtract from your pk points when purchasing an item. Of course, if a whip sells for 1m coins it will require 1m pk points to buy it, so make an exception for the price of an item too.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make it so you can buy items with kills, not GP?
